text: @jimmy_mcandrew @binky53988512 @PatMcAfeeShow WA always throwin up for some good quality ball. Til we die

@binky53988512 @PatMcAfeeShow Very familiar.  Lifelong local.  I’m sitting here watching the game from Hayden Lake, Idaho down the road from Mark Few’s place.  It’s still pretty incredible for this local kid!  #goeags #zagup
@jimmy_mcandrew @PatMcAfeeShow Spokane, home of the largest 3v3 tournament in the world? That city eat sleeps and breathes: basketball. Have you just never heard of Spokane ?
@PatMcAfeeShow A lot of people have pointed out signs that the end is near.  I’m convinced that if two teams from Spokane, WA beat Kansas in the same year we are indeeed in end times.
This Eastern Washington squad is going to slaughter folks at LA Fitnesses for the next 2-3 decades.. https://t.co/Vi8KfiJswW
